application.name: interest
application.brief: Applies an interest operator to the measurments of a control network
application.description: This program uses an interest operator to find the most interesting area near each measurment of a control network. It then creates a new control network using these "more interesting" points as the measurments.

history.change: Tweaked to compile and run with current version of Isis
Added support for image overlap files, new optional parameter "OVERLAPLIST"
Fixed Memory Leaks, Changed Deletion of cubes to use an iterator

parameter.name: FROMLIST
parameter.brief: List of Input cubes in the control network
parameter.description: Use this parameter to specify the cube filenames which are associated with the control network.

parameter.name: NETWORK
parameter.description: This file must contain control network with valid measurments

parameter.name: INTEREST
parameter.brief: PVL file containing the description of the interest operator plugin
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the filename which contains the definition for the interest operator to be used.

parameter.name: OVERLAPLIST
parameter.brief: This is the list of image overlaps corresponding to this control net
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the filename which contains the overlap list. You can obtain this file by running "findimageoverlaps."

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: This file will contain the adjusted control network

parameter.name: NETWORKID
parameter.description: The ID or name of this particular control network. This string should be unique.

parameter.name: DESCRIPTION
parameter.description: A string describing purpose of this control network.
